trans-unit.source:
This is the time-limited Beta of GameMaker 8.1.
This version is only meant for testing the program, not for producing games. You are not allowed to distribute games created with this release candidate in any way.
Please report any errors through our bug tracking system by using the "Report a Bug" option on the HELP menu.
You will need to sign in before you can report bugs.
Describe the problem as carefully as possible, and if possible include an example .gm81 file that exhibits the problematic behavior. Please check and report whether the problem also occured in version 8.0 of Game Maker. Also indicate information about your machine and the version of windows you are using.
trans-unit.target: 这是 GameMaker 8.1 的限时测试版。此版本仅用于测试程序, 而不是用于生成游戏。您不允许以任何方式分发使用此版本候选创建的游戏。请使用 "帮助" 菜单上的 "报告 bug" 选项, 通过我们的 bug 跟踪系统报告任何错误。您将需要登录才能报告 bug。尽可能仔细地描述问题, 如果可能, 还包括一个展示有问题行为的示例. gm81 文件。请检查并报告问题是否也发生在版本8.0 的 Game Maker。还指示有关您的计算机和您正在使用的 windows 版本的信息。

trans-unit.source: To distribute outside the Mac AppStore, El Capitan and above require that your game package is codesigned. Please provide the signing identity that you wish to use here, this should be a Developer ID Application identity and should be present in your Mac's login keychain certificates. Signing identities can be easily created in Xcode->Preferences->Accounts->Team->View Details->Developer ID Application->Create. Signing identities will be matched, so the default value should be sufficient if you are only the member of one development team.
